identity.name: Richgang FX Indice Killer
identity.emotional_goal: Make the user feel like a predator in the market. Confidence, Focus, Control.

heading.usage: Headings, Big Stats, Hero Text. Use 'tracking-tighter' for large sizes.

body.usage: UI Text, Labels, Descriptions. Clean and legible.

mono.usage: Prices, Tickers, Confidence Scores, Time. The 'Data' font.

rules: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL numerical data to ensure tabular alignment.

containers.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]
containers.card: relative overflow-hidden rounded-none border border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-950/50 backdrop-blur-md

buttons.primary: bg-[#00FF94] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-[#00CC76] rounded-sm px-6 py-3 transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,255,148,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(0,255,148,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-neutral-700 text-white hover:border-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-sm px-6 py-3 uppercase tracking-wide transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-[#FF0055] text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-wide hover:bg-[#CC0044] rounded-sm px-6 py-3 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,0,85,0.3)]

cards.signal_card: group relative border border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-900/40 p-6 hover:border-neutral-700 transition-colors
cards.stat_card: border-l-2 border-neutral-800 bg-neutral-900/20 p-4 hover:bg-neutral-900/40 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-neutral-950 border-neutral-800 focus:border-[#00FF94] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00FF94] rounded-sm h-12 text-white placeholder:text-neutral-600 font-mono

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")
textures.grid: linear-gradient(to right, #262626 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(to bottom, #262626 1px, transparent 1px)

assets.icons: Lucide React (Default). Use 'stroke-1' for a thin, technical look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force DARK MODE. There is no light mode for this app. It is a terminal.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid. No wasted space. Dense data.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners (use rounded-sm or rounded-none).
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them with gradients (Green for up, Red for down). Hide grid lines or make them very subtle.
6. SIGNAL CARDS: These are the core. Make them pop. Use the 'Neon Glow' effect on the active signal card.
7. BACKGROUND: Use the 'background_texture' image as a fixed background with 10% opacity over the black base.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable inside containers, but keep the grid dense.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
